question: मा गृधः कस्यस्विद्धनम् has been adopted as the logo of which Indian authority?
explanation: Shri Justice Pinaki Chandra Ghose launched the logo of Lokpal, at an event. The motto of Lokpal मा गृधः कस्यस्विद्धनम् adopted.The Logo and Motto/Slogan of Lokpal in the stationary, backdrop, for IEC, and any other way that the Lokpal. The open for competition amongst all public (individuals/organizations) to submit their Logo latest by 13.06.2019 at 2345 hours. Around 2236 entries received for logo and total 4705 entries received for Motto/Slogan through Mygov portal from people of varied age groups and different parts of the country. On the three-stage selection process, the Logo design of Shri Prashant Mishra, Prayagraj, Uttar Pradesh, is selected for adoption as Logo of Lokpal.
